StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateStatusByNWAID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, CS.STATUS_CODE, CS.DISPOSITION_CODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 106) AS STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = @NWAID) INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (CS.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID))
